sense.gloss: millet or rice cake, roasted and hardened with starch syrup and sugar (sometimes including peanuts, etc.)
roasted millet or rice cake used to make okoshi

meanings: cakes made from rice flour twisted into rings
cakes made from rice flour twisted into rings
